page.title: 11SCHOOL CROSSING PATROLS
page.content: My day started at 6.30a.m.when my radio alarm went off.I got up at 7.00a.m.then had an egg breakfast with coffee.I got the family ready for School at about 8.00a.m.I cycled to work as a Lollypop Lady and I got home at about 9.05a.m.At 1.00p.m. I had lunch of bacon,cheese,sausages and cooked meat.I just had time to clean the budgie's cage.At about 2.50p.m. I cycled back to School as the children leave at about 3.15p.m.and 3.30p.m. When the last ones have gone home I go home and start preparing dinner.New potatoes and cooked meat followed by ice cream or a piece of yesterday's cheesecake.I have dinner about 6.00p.m.At about 8.00p.m. I play squash and at 11.30p.m.I go to bed.I have had a very nice day.
